DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate effect certolizumab pegol ( CZP ) quality sperm obtain healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effects Certolizumab Pegol Semen Quality Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: CZP PEGylated humanize Fab ' fragment specificity human tumor necrosis factor alpha ( TNFα ) . Evidence suggest modulation TNFα signaling may affect male spermatogenesis . Therefore , study compare semen quality parameter single 400 mg dose CZP , match placebo .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer normal baseline semen quality parameter Previous participation study involve TNF inhibitor Prior treatment biologic response modifier within 5 halflives History trauma surgery pelvis/genital area Tests positive tuberculosis , HIV , Hepatitis B C
